content: free pattern tom anks jr pattern by halime özel @handmade_by_halime dear crochet lover abbreviations chain = chain/s single_crochet = single_crochet much love time and effort have been put increase = increase crochet 2 single_crochet in the same stitch into designing this amigurumi and i would decrease = decrease crochet 2 single_crochet together appreciate if you please give credit to me bobble = bobble stitch and add the following note to your item round = round s pattern by @handmade_by_halime … x x = repeat instructions in brackets x times = total number of stitches in the round or row in other social media channels than instagram use the hashtag #handmadebyhalime materials required yarn i used a cotton and acrylic blend dk do not reproduce alterate or sell this pattern weight yarn scheepjes soft fun for the main or claim it s yours even if you just change color it is enough with 25 g colors used the design slightly or translate it moss green 2606 wheat beige 2533 if you like to translate this pattern to another pecan brown 2491 lace white 2426 language please send me a message first mini version was made with fingering weight yarn mixed yarn & colors favorite hobbii i m more than happy for you as a private rainbow 8/4 etc person to gift or sell any items made from this crochet hook 2 5 mm mini version 1 75 mm pattern but always credit me as the designer fibrefill / toy stuffing stitch marker scissor and embroidery needle never hesitate to contact me through my security eyes 8 mm mini version 6 mm instagram account and i will do my best to help you size 16 cm/6 in length enjoy this pattern mini version 12 cm/ 5 in in length with love dk weight yarn fingering hook 2 5 mm weight yarn halime hook 1 75 mm head shield work with brown color turn the piece after each row *after the 1 chain chain you will start crochet on the second chain from the hook make 7 chains row 1 start on the second chain from the hook 6 single_crochet 6 row 2 1 chain* 6 single_crochet 6 row 3 1 chain* increase 4 single_crochet increase 8 row 4 1 chain* 8 single_crochet 8 row 5 1 chain* increase 6 single_crochet increase 10 row 6-8 1 chain* 10 single_crochet 3 row 10 fasten_off and leave a long tail to sew to the head @handmade_by_halime head start with beige color make 7 chains round 1 start on the second chain from the hook 5 single_crochet 3 single_crochet in last chain turn and work on the opposite side of the chain 4 single_crochet increase 14 round 2 increase 4 single_crochet increase x 3 4 single_crochet increase x 2 20 round 3 20 single_crochet 20 round 4 1 single_crochet increase 3 single_crochet change to green color 2 single_crochet increase 3 single_crochet increase 5 single_crochet increase 2 single_crochet 24 round 5-6 24 single_crochet 2 rounds 24 where
